Text: Thanks! It's the x32 version. Is x64 version available anywhere or anytime soon?

Worked like a charm on Win7 (32-bit), for an old Epson Perfection 1250 Scanner. No current drivers/software available from Epson (don't ya just love 'em?), now it runs great â€” so thanks again :-)
thanks dude it worked perfectly, saved me $40 :P
I just took a punt and installed this on my Win7 x64 using my old 2000-model Agfa SnapScan e50 and blow me, the fuckin' thing works perfectly! Wow! Thanks uploader.
Downloaded quickly. Installed seamlessly. Works perfectly. Thank you uploader.

The only problem I have noticed is when saving the file as a .pdf, the application has to be closed in order to move or rename the newly created .pdf. Annoyance? yes...but definitely not enough of an annoyance to justify uninstalling the software.

Amendment to last comment...

Make sure you click "Last Page" when finished scanning a document you saved as a .pdf. This will release the file and allow you to rename and/or move the file.
Worked for an ancient Canon Canoscan LiDE 30, Windows Vista 64-bit; no driver available from manufacturer.  Screw planned obsolescence -- this works perfectly!  Thank you SO much.
All good on Win 7 x64. Thanks!
